roleset.name: (cause to) become dried out, cause to become dried out via an electric current
roleset.note: DESICCATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'desiccate' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4. (from desiccate.01-v predicate notes)
ELECTRODESICCATION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to desiccate.01. Desiccate.01 is a member of vncls other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie. (from electrodesiccation.01-n)

role.descr: instrument or manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: Bacon, author not meat product
example.text: Bodies-1 desiccated *-1 by heat or age.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: electrodesiccation of two squamous cell carcinomas
